argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | emcl.1 | |- F = ( n e. NN |-> ( sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) - ( log ` n ) ) ) |
| 2 |  | emcl.2 | |- G = ( n e. NN |-> ( sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) - ( log ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_fzfid | |- ( n e. NN -> ( 1 ... n ) e. Fin ) |
| 4 |  | #P_elfznn | |- ( m e. ( 1 ... n ) -> m e. NN ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( n e. NN /\ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ) -> m e. NN ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_nnrecred | |- ( ( n e. NN /\ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ) -> ( 1 / m ) e. RR ) |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_fsumrecl | |- ( n e. NN -> sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) e. RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_nnrp | |- ( n e. NN -> n e. RR+ ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_relogcld | |- ( n e. NN -> ( log ` n ) e. RR ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_resubcld | |- ( n e. NN -> ( sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) - ( log ` n ) ) e. RR ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_fmpti | |- F : NN --> RR |
| 12 |  | #P_peano2nn | |- ( n e. NN -> ( n + 1 ) e. NN ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_nnrpd | |- ( n e. NN -> ( n + 1 ) e. RR+ ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_relogcld | |- ( n e. NN -> ( log ` ( n + 1 ) ) e. RR ) |
| 15 | 7, 14 | #P_resubcld | |- ( n e. NN -> ( sum_ m e. ( 1 ... n ) ( 1 / m ) - ( log ` ( n + 1 ) ) ) e. RR ) |
| 16 | 2, 15 | #P_fmpti | |- G : NN --> RR |
| 17 | 11, 16 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( F : NN --> RR /\ G : NN --> RR ) |
